name: Pong (2 player game)
description:
This is a Pong game i've made... and every real gamer knows what Pong is so I don't gotta explain that.

Control's:

Left Player

  • Up with "W" and down with "S"

Right Player

  • Up with "Top Arrow" and down with "Bottom Arrow".

Incoming features:                                                                                                                                            

  1. A Menu (DONE)
  2. AI so you can play singleplayer
  3. Score counter (DONE)
  4. Pause screen  (DONE)
  5. Sound effects (DONE)
  6. Major bug fixes
  7. Two new game modes (DONE)

MADE BY FRAX
